content: On his tour of Italy, he visited several cities which are famous for their scenic beauty, for instance, Naples and Florence.
translations: ita:Durante il suo giro in Italia, ha visitato diverse città famose per la loro bellezza scenica, ad esempio Napoli e Firenz
